nodes.text: Lucas Graciano is an artist who provided artwork for Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game expansion sets: Champions of the Force, Squadrons Over Corellia, Galactic Hunters and The Shadow Syndicate.

In 2013, he was nominated for the Chelsey Award for Best Color Work – Unpublished, which is given by the Association of Science Fiction and Fantasy Artists (ASFA) to recognize unpublished achievements in original color science fiction & fantasy artwork eligible in the year previous to the award. The piece of his that was nominated was "Guardianship,"; oil. However, he did not win.
In 2014, he did win a Chelsey Award for Best Gaming-Related Illustration for his piece  The Last Stand of Thorin Oakenshield on Lucas Graciano's profile on DeviantArt (backup link)
